section.title: keyset Datatype - Atomia DNS API
section.para: [keyset|keyset Datatype - Atomia DNS API] is a struct with the following members: || Member || Type || Description || | id | int | the id of the key | | algorithm | string | the algorithm of the key | | activated | int | 0 if the key is inactive and 1 if it is active | | keysize | int | the size of the key in bits | | keytype | string | ZSK or KSK | | activated_at | string | the date of the key activation or empty if not activated | | deactivated_at | string | the date of the key deactivation or empty if not deactivated | | keydata | string | the private key in Private-key-format v1.2 |
